basic_info.name: A.M.Reddy Memorial College of Engineering and Technology, Andhra Pradesh: Admission
Selection Criteria:
description: To get admission in this institution, the Jawaharlal Nehru Technical university conducts an engineering agriculture and Medical common entrance Test (EAMCET). Based on the score obtained in this exam seats are allotted for the students. 70% seats are allotted by the convener, EAMCET admissions, based on the rank obtained in the test. 30% seats are filled by the management. Generally the admission is started after the +2 results. All the scheduled dates are followed as per the directions of the convener, government of Andhra Pradesh.

basic_info.name: A.M.Reddy Memorial College of Engineering and Technology, Andhra Pradesh: Facilities
description: Sports – The indoor and outdoor games are available inside the playground. All the students are encouraged to participate in all the sports. They give equal importance to both studies and sports.

Hostel – This institute provides accommodation for both boys and girls. All the rooms in the hostel contain light, fan, cupboard with attached bath with 24 hours hot water supply. Other facilities are also available inside the hostel.
Transportation – For the students those who are in the local area have the transport facilities. It
seems to be safe for all the students to reach the college.
Cafeteria – At the time of the refreshment Students can visit there and get anything by paying.

basic_info.name: A.M.Reddy Memorial College of Engineering and Technology, Andhra Pradesh: Faculty

Section.name: About AM Reddy Memorial College of Engineering and Technology
Section.description:
A.M.Reddy Memorial College of Engineering and Technology was located away from the city life in Guntur district in the state of Andhra Pradesh. This institute was popularly known as AM Reddy and was established in the year 2008 and spread over a 10 acres amidst the green lush fields just 7kms away from the Narasaraopet. It is accredited by AICTE and affiliated to Jawaharlal Nehru Technical university.
The Institute offers 14 courses across 2 streams namely engineering, management and 4 degrees like B.Tech, M.Tech, MBA, Diploma.
The college has the placement cell that assists their students in recruiting them to various industries and organisations for their better future. They have separate training staff in the placement cell to help the students to search their career. They give aptitude training Communication training and some of the other programs. Some of the reputed companies are visited there like, Amazon, ICICI bank, Just Dial, Tech Mahendra, IBM, Big basket, Intel, Infosys, Tata consultancy services etc.
The admission is based on merit and entrance tests conducted by the college. Application form is available on online mode in the college official website. All the facilities for the students are provided by the college.
Read More: A.M.Reddy Memorial College of Engineering and Technology Courses & Fees
To get admission in this institution, the Jawaharlal Nehru Technical university conducts an engineering agriculture and Medical common entrance Test (EAMCET). Based on the score obtained in this exam seats are allotted for the students. 70% seats are allotted by the convener, EAMCET admissions, based on the rank obtained in the test. 30% seats are filled by the management. Generally the admission is started after the +2 results. All the scheduled dates are followed as per the directions of the convener, government of Andhra Pradesh.
Sports – The indoor and outdoor games are available inside the playground. All the students are encouraged to participate in all the sports. They give equal importance to both studies and sports.
Hostel – This institute provides accommodation for both boys and girls. All the rooms in the hostel contain light, fan, cupboard with attached bath with 24 hours hot water supply. Other facilities are also available inside the hostel.
Transportation – For the students those who are in the local area have the transport facilities. It
seems to be safe for all the students to reach the college.
Cafeteria – At the time of the refreshment Students can visit there and get anything by paying.
Other facilities:
Ques. What is the address of A.M Reddy College of Engineering and Technology?
Ans. A.M. Reddy memorial college of engineering and technology,
Petlurivaripalem,
Narasaraopet – Mandal,
Guntur – 522601,
Andhra Pradesh, India.
Ques. How to contact A.M Reddy College of Engineering and Technology?
Ans.
E-mail- principal.amreddyengineering@gmail.com
Phone number- 86472-47190
Mobile Number- 9959838989
Ques. Is the placement process the same for all the courses in A.M.Reddy Memorial College of Engineering and Technology?
Ans. Yes, the placement cell in this institution gives equal training for the students. There are no other special classes for the students. But they sent the students for that particular company as per the students wish.
Ques. What is the refund policy given by A.M.Reddy Memorial College of Engineering and Technology?
Ans. In case a student discontinues their studies at the center of the academic year, the college didn’t refund the fee for the students. They have to pay the full academic fee before leaving.
Ques. What about the summer internships in A.M.Reddy Memorial College of Engineering and Technology?
Ans. For every year the management arranged for the internship, workshops, seminars and webinars. All the students are benefited in this internship program by getting some knowledge and experience.
